name: 劉傳銘
objective: 本課程探討處理空間資料的模式與演算法則，主題包含: (1) 空間資料庫介紹與應用, (2) 空間概念與資料模式, (3) 空間搜尋語言, (4) 空間資料儲存與索引, (5) 搜尋處理與最佳化, (6) 空間網路, (7) 空間資料庫的研究趨勢。
schedule:
Introduction to Spatial Databases (3hrs)
Spatial Concepts and Data Models (4hrs)
paper review (4hrs)
Spatial Query Languages (3hrs)
Spatial Storage and Indexing (6hrs)
papre review (4hrs)
Query Processing and Optimization (6hrs)
Spatial Networks (3hrs)
Recent Trends in Spatial Databases (9hrs)
Moving Objects Databases (8hrs)
paper review (4hrs)
materials:
Referred Books
*Shashi Shekhar and Sanjay Chawla, Spatial Databases: A Tour, Prentice Hall, 2003. ISBN: 0-13-017480-7
*Ralf Hartmut Gutting and Markus Schneider, Moving Objects Databases, Morgan Kaufmann, 2005. ISBN-10: 0-12-088799-6
